title: Searge：长期存在的光照BUG已被修复
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-7-19 13:46 编辑 






@SeargeDP
I fixed a long standing bug today. Lighting issues in world generation. Bye bye black patches. See my nice amplified：http://www.gfycat.com/InsidiousMasculineArchaeocete
我今天修复了一个存在了很长时间的BUG。那就是世界生成时存在的光照问题。黑色斑块再见了~！看一下增强后的效果：http://www.gfycat.com/InsidiousMasculineArchaeocete

replies.author: dcsuibian
replies.txt_content: 支持，新闻加油
